cluster_relations.rel_desc: News disseminated via social networking sites reaches a wider audience.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject (an information item or communication channel) reaches or becomes accessible to a specified audience or recipient group.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: RelativeReach: larger than via traditional media outlets

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Traditional media outlets also reach an audience, but more slowly than news via social networking sites.
